code: import React,{useState,useMemo,useEffect}from'react';import styled from"styled-components";import useOne from"./useOne";import useCounter from'./useCounter';import{Usage as CompoundComponent}from'./Counter Pattern/Usage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[test,setTest]=useState(0);const{counter,count}=useCounter(100);const consoleLogUseMemo=useMemo(()=>{console.log(1);},[test]);useEffect(()=>{console.log(2);},[]);useOne(()=>{console.log(3);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Hello!",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:count,children:counter===0?'Нажми на меня!':'Вы нажали на кнопку '+counter+'раз'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setTest(test+1),children:test===0?'Нажми на меня!':'Вы нажали на кнопку '+test+'раз'})]});}export default App;
